lead_paragraph: An examination by the state comptroller of 10 schools found that almost a third of the violent episodes were not reported, as required.

headline.print_headline: Audit Faults City on School Violence Reports
headline.main: New York City Underreported School Violence to State, Audit Shows

snippet: An examination by the state comptroller of 10 schools found that almost a third of the violent episodes were not reported, as required.
abstract: New York State Comptroller Thomas P DiNapoli releases report finding that Education Dept failed to disclose nearly one third of violent episodes at 10 New York City public schools under review; department is required to report all such cases.
